com.salimov.yurii.service.data.interfaces

Interface SectionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentService<Section,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Section,java.lang.Long>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SectionServiceImpl

    public interface SectionService
extends ContentService<Section,java.lang.Long>
    The interface of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of the class Section.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Section, ContentService, DataService

    • Method Detail

      • initAndAdd

        Section initAndAdd(java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.lang.String keywords,
                   org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile photoFile,
                   boolean isValid)
        Initializes, saves and returns a new section.
        Parameters:
        title - a title of the new section.
        description - a description of the new section.
        keywords - a keywords of the new section.
        photoFile - a file of main file to the new section.
        isValid - a validated of the new section.
        Returns:
        The new saving section.
        See Also:
        Section, Photo

      • initAndUpdate

        Section initAndUpdate(java.lang.String url,
                      java.lang.String title,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      java.lang.String keywords,
                      org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile photoFile,
                      java.lang.String photoAction,
                      boolean isValid)
        Initializes, updates and returns section with parameter id. Returns null if id is null.
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the section to update.
        title - a new title to the section.
        description - a new title to the section.
        keywords - a new title to the section.
        photoFile - a file of file to the section.
        photoAction - a action on the file.
        isValid - a validated of the section.
        Returns:
        The updating section with parameter id or null.
        See Also:
        Section, Photo
